overview: Francis, a modern-day one-eyed man, struggles to see our world the way we see it. His single eye perceives other-dimensional multiversal shapes, creatures and colors unknown to the human mind. Aided by a ridiculed experimental scientist and a former child star narrator of books-on-tape, Francis transforms himself many times over in his attempt to find a place to belong within our confining three-dimensional world.
title: Loves of a Cyclops
